title: How to look at a student’s work in Google Classroom - Quora

response.answer_text: Go to classroom.google.com and click Sign In. ...Click the class.At the top, click People and then the student's name. ...Check this page for: ...(Optional) To see details or answers, click the work. ...(Optional) To filter the student's work, under Filters, click Turned in, Returned with the grade, or Missing.
